성기사의 직업 특성은 다음과 같습니다.

무기와 갑옷 숙련: 성기사 are proficient with all simple and martial 무기, with all types of 갑옷(heavy, medium, and 빛), and with 방패(except tower 방패).

선의 오라 (Ex): The power of a 성기사의 선의 오라 (see the 선 감지 spell) is equal to her 성기사 레벨.

악 감지 (Sp): At will, a 성기사 can use 악 감지, as the spell.

악 처벌 (Su): Once per day, a 성기사 may attempt to 악 처벌 with one normal melee 공격. She adds her 매력 보너스(if any) to her 명중 굴림 and deals 1 extra point of 피해 per 성기사 레벨. If 성기사 accidentally smites a creature that is not evil, the smite has no effect, but the ability is still used up for that day.

At 5th 레벨, and at every five 레벨 thereafter, 성기사 may 악 처벌 one additional time per day, as indicated on 표: 성기사, to a maximum of five times per day at 20th 레벨.

신성한 우아함 (Su): At 2nd 레벨, a 성기사 gains 보너스 equal to her 매력 보너스(if any) on all 내성 굴림.

치유의 손길 (Su): Beginning at 2nd 레벨, a 성기사 with a 매력 score of 12 or higher can 치료 wounds (her own or those of others) by touch. Each day she can 치료 a total number of 히트 포인트 of 피해 equal to her 성기사 레벨 x her 매력 보너스. A 성기사 may choose to divide her 치료 among multiple recipients, and she doesn’t have to use it all at once. Using 치유의 손길 is a standard action.

Alternatively, a 성기사 can use any or all of this 치료 power to deal 피해 to undead creatures. Using lay on hands in this way requires a successful melee touch 공격 and doesn’t provoke an 공격 of opportunity. The 성기사 decides how many of her daily allotment of points to use as 피해 after successfully touching an undead creature.

용기의 오라 (Su): Beginning at 3rd 레벨, a 성기사 is immune to 공포(magical or otherwise). Each ally within 10 feet of her gains a +4 의욕 보너스 on 내성 굴림 against 공포 effects.

This ability functions while 성기사 is conscious, but not if she is unconscious or 죽음.

신성 건강 (Ex): At 3rd 레벨, a 성기사 gains immunity to all 질병, including supernatural and magical 질병.

언데드 퇴치 (Su):When a 성기사 reaches 4 레벨, she gains the supernatural ability to 언데드 퇴치. She may use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + her 매력 수정치. She turns undead as a 사제 of three 레벨 lower would.

주문: Beginning at 4 레벨, a 성기사 gains the ability to cast a small number of 신성 주문, which are drawn from 성기사 spell list. A 성기사 must choose and prepare her 주문 in advance.

To prepare or 주문 시전, a 성기사 must have a 지혜 score equal to at least 10 + the spell 레벨. 난이도 등급 for a 내성 굴림 against a 성기사의 spell is 10 + the spell 레벨 + 성기사의 지혜 수정치.

Like other spellcasters, a 성기사 can cast only a certain number of 주문 of each spell 레벨 per day. Her base daily spell allotment is given on 표: 성기사. In addition, she receives 보너스 주문 per day if she has a high 지혜 score. When 표: 성기사 indicates that 성기사 gets 0 주문 per day of a given spell 레벨, she gains only 보너스 주문 she would be entitled to based on her 지혜 score for that spell 레벨 성기사 does not have access to any domain 주문 or granted powers, as a 사제 does.

A 성기사 prepares and casts 주문 the way a 사제 does, though she cannot lose a prepared spell to spontaneously cast a cure spell in its place. A 성기사 may prepare and cast any spell on 성기사 spell list, provided that she can cast 주문 of that 레벨, but she must choose which 주문 to prepare during her daily meditation.

Through 3rd 레벨, a 성기사 has no 시전자 레벨. At 4 레벨 and higher, her 시전자 레벨 is one-half her 성기사 레벨.

Special 탈것 소환 (Sp): Upon reaching 5th 레벨, a 성기사 gains the service of an unusually intelligent, strong, and loyal steed to serve her in her crusade against evil (see below). This 탈것 소환 is usually a heavy warhorse (for a Medium 성기사) or a warpony (for a Small 성기사).

Once per day, as a full-round action, a 성기사 may magically call her 탈것 소환 from the celestial realms in which it resides. This ability is the equivalent of a spell of a 레벨 equal to one-third 성기사의 레벨. 탈것 소환 immediately appears adjacent to 성기사 and remains for 2 hours per 성기사 레벨; it may be dismissed at any time as a free action. 탈것 소환 is the same creature each time it is summoned, though 성기사 may release a particular 탈것 소환 from service.

Each time 탈것 소환 is called, it appears in full health, regardless of any 피해 it may have taken previously. 탈것 소환 also appears wearing or carrying any gear it had when it was last dismissed. Calling a 탈것 소환 is a 소환술(calling) effect.

Should 성기사의 탈것 소환 die, it immediately disappears, leaving behind any 장비 it was carrying. The 성기사 may not summon another 탈것 소환 for thirty days or until she gains a 성기사 레벨, whichever comes first, even if 탈것 소환 is somehow returned from 죽음. During this thirty-day period, 성기사 takes a –1 페널티 on 공격 and weapon 피해 rolls.

질병 제거 (Sp): At 6th 레벨, a 성기사 can produce a 질병 제거 effect, as the spell, once per week. She can use this ability one additional time per week for every three 레벨 after 6th (twice per week at 9th, three times at 12th, and so forth).

행동강령: A 성기사 must be of lawful good 성향 and loses all class 능력 if she ever willingly commits an evil act.

Additionally, a 성기사의 code requires that she respect legitimate authority, act with honor (not lying, not cheating, not using 독, and so forth), help those in need (provided they do not use the help for evil or chaotic ends), and punish those who 해악 or threaten innocents.

규합: While she may adventure with characters of any good or neutral 성향, a 성기사 will never knowingly associate with evil characters, nor will she continue an association with someone who consistently offends her moral code. A 성기사 may accept only henchmen, followers, or cohorts who are lawful good.

A 성기사 who ceases to be lawful good, who willfully commits an evil act, or who grossly violates the code of conduct loses all 성기사 주문 and 능력(including the service of 성기사의 탈것 소환, but not weapon, 갑옷, and 방패 proficiencies). She may not progress any farther in 레벨 as a 성기사. She regains her 능력 and 성장 potential if she atones for her violations (see the 속죄 spell 묘사), as appropriate.

Like a member of any other class, a 성기사 may be a multiclass character, but multiclass 성기사 face a special restriction. A 성기사 who gains a 레벨 in any class other than 성기사 may never again raise her 성기사 레벨, though she retains all her 성기사 능력.

성기사의 탈것 소환

The standard 탈것 소환 for a Medium 성기사 is a heavy warhorse, and the standard 탈것 소환 for a Small 성기사 is a warpony. Another kind of 탈것 소환, such as a riding 개(for a 하플링 성기사) or a Large 상어(for a 성기사 in an aquatic campaign) may be allowed as well.

야생 공감(Ex): A 레인저 can improve the attitude of an animal. This ability functions just like a 외교 check to improve the attitude of a person. 레인저 rolls 1d20 and adds his 레인저 레벨 and his 매력 보너스 to determine the 야생 공감 check result. The typical domestic animal has a starting attitude of indifferent, while wild animals are usually unfriendly.

To use 야생 공감, 레인저 and the animal must be able to study each other, which means that they must be within 30 feet of one another under normal visibility 상태이상. Generally, influencing an animal in this way takes 1 minute, but, as with influencing people, it might take more or less time.

If 레인저 selects archery, he is treated as having 재빠른 사격 feat, even if he does not have the normal 전제조건 for that feat.

If 레인저 selects two-weapon 전투, he is treated as having 쌍수 무기 전투술 feat, even if he does not have the normal 전제조건 for that feat.

A character may add new classes as he or she progresses in 레벨, thus becoming a multiclass character. The class 능력 from a character의 different classes combine to determine a multiclass character의 overall 능력. Multiclassing improves a character의 versatility at the expense of focus.

As a general rule, 능력 of a multiclass character are the sum of 능력 of each of the character의 classes.

“직업 레벨” is a character의 레벨 in a particular class. For a character whose 레벨 are all in the same class, character 레벨 and 직업 레벨 are the same.

If a skill is not a class skill for any of a multiclass character의 classes, the maximum rank for that skill is one-half the maximum for a class skill.
